report.title: Events list
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms ttl1 JOIN terms tinput ON tinput.id=ttl1.term_id JOIN termlists_terms ttl2 ON ttl2.meaning_id=ttl1.meaning_id JOIN terms t ON t.id=ttl2.term_id ) ON ttl1.id=l.location_type_id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_id=l.id AND lav.location_attribute_id=#max_people_attr_id# AND lav.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavEvent on lavEvent.location_id=l.id AND lavEvent.location_attribute_id=#event_date_attr_id# AND lavEvent.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavHistoric on lavHistoric.location_id=l.id AND lavHistoric.location_attribute_id=#historic_attr_id# AND lavHistoric.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pav on pav.int_value=l.id AND pav.person_attribute_id=#user_event_attr_id# AND pav.deleted=false #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(l.location_type_id AS character varying)='#location_type_id#') AND ((#historic_mode# = false AND (lavHistoric.id IS NULL OR lavHistoric.int_value = 0)) OR (#historic_mode# = true AND lavHistoric.int_value = 1)) GROUP BY lavEvent.date_start_value, lavEvent.date_end_value, lavEvent.date_type_value, l.id, l.name, l.comment,lav.int_value #order_by#

param.name: user_event_attr_id
param.display: Id of the person attribute that holds user events

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type for events

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: max_people_attr_id
param.description: Attribute Id that holds the maximum number of people allowed on the event.

param.name: event_date_attr_id
param.description: Attribute Id that holds the event date.

param.name: historic_attr_id
param.description: Attribute Id that holds whether an event is historic.

param.name: historic_mode
param.description: True if only historic events are to be shown. False excludes historic events

column.name: full
column.sql: case when count(pav.id)>=lav.int_value then 'FULL' else 'Spaces available' end

column.name: full_bool
column.sql: case when count(pav.id)>=lav.int_value then false else true end
